website_summaries.verdict: A mattress that's generously-sized without overwhelming the room. Built-in pump for added convenience.
pros: Built-in electric pump inflates bed in less than 5 minutes
Medium, manageable height that's not too low but not oversized
I-beam internal construction for weight distribution
cons: May be larger than double size in reality

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am 24st and have used this everyday for the last 3 months including folding away on a daily basis and I am shocked at how well it performs in terms of comfort and not losing air. I have had good quality air beds in the past but this is another level I genuinely can't fault it in any way. If you're on the heavier side as I am then I only hope this review will help you buy with confidence as I have put it through it's paces, no air bed is built for everyday use but this has certainly stood up to exactly that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to hate camping... now loving it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates camping because he never sleeps very well. We have just been away camping for the weekend with the new sable bed and he's already asking to go camping again. He's a large guy and I'm petite and bed was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to inflate, soft to lie on. Great product
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW HORNBY

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable bed
customer_reviews.text: Ideal inflatable mattress for our 'guest room'. Easy to inflate and very comfortable. The raised area at the top is a great idea to save worrying about pillows. My kids have already asked if they can sleep on it rather than our guests! Excellent value too.
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, (very) high quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. It arrived 2 days after ordering it, in perfect condition. What you see in the image is a double bed which could easily fit 3 people. It’s velvety finish is very comfortable and if anything, it’s probably better than my regular bed :) It took less than 3 minutes to inflate and about the same to deflate The deflation is perfect, as in there’s no air left inside when fully deflated, which makes it very easy to repack and store away I would definitely recommend spending the extra money for so much higher quality than what you usually get. Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and easy to use apart from deformation
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfy when sleeping on, and very quick to inflate/deflate, for good value for money paid. Unfortunately something went wrong in the middle of the mattress (after 6 medium month use) as attached, but when emailed the customer service they were top notch sorting the issue and sending a replacement in just few days. Top quality customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Zidan

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a air bed to be used for 6 weeks as a regular bed. There were many cheaper airbeds available on the Amazon. But, I decided to go ahead with this expensive option. I have not regret even one bit. This bed is a excellent quality product. It is very easy to both inflate and deflate and is very comfortable to sleep. And it is quite big (Queen Size). Two people can sleep very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: J Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but our item was deffective
customer_reviews.text: A bit ashame that we received a faulty item. 25-10-2018: Update We received a new replacement and i am totally satisfied with sleeping on this air bed.
customer_reviews.author: Vasi

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortsble air bed ive ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Having decided to make the jump into more than just a camping bed we deliberated over the many types of extra height air beds fortunatly following the reviews we settled on this beauty and boy does it live upto expectation
customer_reviews.author: richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a dream to sleep on. A whopping 220cm length for someone who is 198 (6'6"), easily and quickly inflated, truly comfortable. However, having used on and off for over half a year now, a hole popped along the mid rigde while getting up at night. Sorry to say, thought it would last a few years to come.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is made from really high quality materials and is really comfortable and steady. It's really easy to use. You plug it in and twist the dial to inflate and within about 4 minutes it's ready. To deflate you twist it the other way and it sucks the air out. There's also a nozzle you can take out to get the remaining air out for when you roll it up. It comes with a carry bag which is handy. You can also pump it manually if you don't have electricity if your taking it camping. The customer service team are very good as well in helping.
customer_reviews.author: VonWeavey

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant blow up bed
customer_reviews.text: Can not recommend this bed enough, it’s brilliant great quality and it’s really comfortable. We slept on it for our whole camping holiday and I wouldn’t go back now. Definitely would measure as it is quite big.
customer_reviews.author: aprille

customer_reviews.title: Big, quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The built-in pump is fast. Is really big. Though you select a double on the order the description of the ad says queen. I can confirm that it is queen size. The guests using it were happy and it didn't deflate over night Comes with a storage bag which was a added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Slept on for two nights, really pleased. Comfortable, easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: It's inflatable
customer_reviews.text: Inflates really quick and the storage bag is useful. Downside is trying to find sheets to fit it as it's so big.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Mitchard

customer_reviews.title: The size unbelievable and quality second to none
customer_reviews.text: This amazing airbed the size is unbelievable I got the double and it's like a super king can't wait to use it might sleep on it tonight instead of me bed to give it a full test would recommend to anyone and I looked about at all sorts of their beds but went with the best reviews But the first night I'm used it went down send it straight back got a refund no problem
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Slept on this for 5 nights during a re-furb of bedrooms. Very comfortable but the sizing is (for me at least) confusing. It said double when I ordered, the title said queen size but went on to say it's a double, the box said queen-size and the actual bed is massive. This is not an issue unless you want to put some bedding on the bed. KIng Size fitted sheet was too small. I'm keeping but will look for a gigantic fitted sheet or at least a flat one. The bed is really easy to inflate and de-flate but set it up near a plug socket or use an extension as the cable if fairly short.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: It’s a firm and comfortable bed I was in doubt when ordering this mattress but it’s really good mattress.it arrived the next day with prime delivery and it was well packed.Thank you Amazon,
customer_reviews.author: asha

customer_reviews.title: Updated review! Amazing so far!
customer_reviews.text: Update 22.05.20 We have used the bed a few times now and we are still really impressed and so pleased we bought it. Being on the heavier side myself i am always hesitant with blow up beds...not anymore...i slept like a baby!! 100% recommend this bed! Purhased due to the amazing reviews and having previously borrowed an awful one! Super easy to inflate and roll back up-just follow the instructions-simple. We popped it in the tent in the garden due to lockdown and tested it. No complaints, very very comfortable, its huge! We have booked campin end of june and hopefully restrictions will have been lifted so we can go and use it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best airbed I've ever slept on!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a number of airbeds in my time but the Sable one is by far and away the best! Setting it up was simple - plug it in and it's inflated within minutes. (I love the way the pump is integral and that the cord and plug store away in their own compartment.) The mattress feels firm and stable. I've never had an air mattress high and firm enough to sit on the edge before - this one you can. I don't sleep well but had a great few nights in my 5m bell tent with this. I'd certainly recommend this to anyone looking to buy something either for camping or just an occasional bed for visitors.
customer_reviews.author: TimT

customer_reviews.title: great and usefull
customer_reviews.text: I dont have any complaints with it, some of you might be unlucky...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good product, easy to inflate and very comfortable to sleep. It is also though quite loud during inflation, but you can't have it all.
customer_reviews.author: Tasos

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfy but something happened with the bed and air start to deflate.
customer_reviews.text: Bought air beds because we moved the house. And decided wait for proper furniture. After some time using its start to deflate. Had to inflate air at night time 4 times. And I am jus 50kg. Wanted to exchange because my back already get used to this bed. But amazon said that seller doesn’t have them anymore. I saw they have but not that price. Anyway had to buy a new one ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bed. A bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Pumped up in minutes and has held air for 3 weeks and is still perfect to sleep on without a single refil. Material seems thick and good quality. Would recommend. Losing a star because it wasn't worth the price (£80) - no air bed is worth £80, but there were no decent ones any cheaper when I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Miss B. M.

customer_reviews.title: This could substitute your bed
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for two months now and to be honest untill it broke it was just awesome. I don't know if it happens to all or was only a fabric error but after almost 2 months it broke in a place where i put the patch and it doesn't stick so i had to return it. I got a full refund and if could have switched this one for one of the same i would but unfortunately i could only have a refund and the price went up so didn't get to buy another one. But overall, i was really sad it broke and I couldn't switch it.
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in plenty of time to bring my son camping but had a trial run last night and the item deflates after about 3 hours very slowly...it wasn't cheap and I was prepared to make a decent purchase if it worked but very sadly this doesn't ...now we have no bed for camping and I am very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: joey shore

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, quick to inflate and no sagging!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this product. It's as good as a normal mattress and doesn't loose air.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo2001

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. Open it up, plug it in and turn it on, fairly quite when filling with air and was solid (comfortable) all night according to our friends who slept on it. No issues deflating and packing away and went back into the supplied bag, it has been used 4 times now and very easy to set up and put away. As a temp bed its ideal and very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: CMDUK

customer_reviews.title: not DOUBLE & deflates
customer_reviews.text: This product is MASSIVE and no good for camping unless you have the space! It’s definitely more KING than double and is super long! I bought 2 and returned due to deflating every night and waking up on the floor - checked fittings and all were secure so not sure where it was deflating from.... if the sizes were accurate and they fixed the deflating issue it would have probably been a really comfortable nights sleep :-( disappointing for the money
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy inflatable mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inflatable air mattress for a family member and this one is the most comfortable air mattress that we ever had. Easy to inflate and deflate thanks to the electric pump. Very happy with my purchase! I was surprise that it is bigger/longer than a simple bed (I didn't pay attention to the size on the detail to be honest), so if you are a tall person, you would easily fit on it!
customer_reviews.author: kevin malkic

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy and loud when it’s inflating but other than that is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Silviu

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose And shortchanged
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly dissatisfied, bought this for a camping holiday, first night had to inflate during the night 5 times, second night even worse, probably woke the whole campsite up, deflated so much we were on the hard floor, made what should have been a relaxing break into a cut short uncomfortable experience and to boot want to give me £10less than I paid for it when I filled in the return to amazon , what a poor product
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraHarrington

customer_reviews.title: Deflated instantly.
customer_reviews.text: Deflated after first use and sent back. Also this bed is bigger than it says it is, it’s a UK king not a double.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: This mattress looks great, when its first inflated it is perfect, good height, great length, nice and firm. Then it all goes down from there, literately. The mattress deflates massively during the night, after about 4 - 5 hours it has lost enough that you are almost on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very easy product to use and surprisingly comfortable. We moved house and have ordered a new bed, but it was on an 8 week order so have bought one of these as a temporary bed. It's great and I would recommend it. Brilliant for guests, but also brilliant for longer use too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Get one
customer_reviews.text: The first one we ordered had a fault and deflated quickly . They sent us another one and refunded straight away. Next one was absolutely Perfect . So comfortable and stayed inflated without the need to top up at all . Love it and would highly recommend the company
customer_reviews.author: Claire Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great for a portable bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping and when visiting/having friends. It inflates in just a few minutes and feels really comfortable. Other models have a plastic finish which isn't particularly nice to sleep on, you can feel it beneath the sheet even and it makes for a sticky night. But this model has a lovely fleece/cotton type layer on top to remove you from the plastic feel. It makes it feel much more luxurious and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Could not recommend this more! Take this on all of our camping trips now, super quick and easy to inflate, and very comfortable to sleep on. Partner is 6”2 and he has no issue sleeping on this in comparison to others we have tried where his feet are off the end of the mattress! Also quite tall so great for camping as keeps you well off the floor away from any cold ground. Price was great, purchased when on offer but would have paid full price 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Keshia Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable mattress - better than most beds
customer_reviews.text: After researching various airbeds I took the plunge and spent a bit more on this one as it had some great reviews. I was not disappointed!! The mattress inflates quickly and easily. Once inflated the mattress is firm and comfortable. I had two friends stay over recently and they told me they were surprised at how comfortable & big it was. The only small quibble is that the mattress is not a standard shape so getting a fitted sheet to fit neatly on it is tough. The solution is probably to use a non-fitted sheet and drape it over the mattress. Overall - a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use with the premium touches.
customer_reviews.text: This airbed is very easy to inflate with the included pump, took literal minutes. Once inflated the first thing you notice is the very soft and insulating cover, premium feel to it. completely sturdy too, if you're looking for a well built and premium airbed then I fully recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: brett t.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Air Bed
customer_reviews.text: This air bed is by far the best I have purchased (and I've bought a few!) Great support and very comfortable. Seems very well made as well This will be used in my Land Rover awning annex room instead of using the roof tent and looking forward to using it next year
customer_reviews.author: David  Owen

customer_reviews.title: Best Air Bed I have Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I paid the little extra for the Sable air bed. It was very comfortable and hardly lost any pressure overnight. Also with the built in pump I just turn it on for a few seconds and the bed is perfectly firm. The built in pillow is also excellent and the bed easily fits me and my 2 kids on it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Biggsy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent airbed. It is as comfortable as sleeping on a normal bed. Very easy and quick to inflate and deflate. It folds up neatly and comes with a bag for storage. Definitely worth paying a bit extra for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: High Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Really is rather large, but was so comfortable that we ended up buying a new tent for it to fit in. The best thing that I have found about it is the fact that unlike other airbed, when the person next to you is moving, you don't get catapulted across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Great blow up Bed and easy to inflate very Big and is perfect for guests staying over or where there is not enough room for a full size bed ,it’s Very Comfortable and certainly a lot easier than you’re usual blow up mattress which would’ve gone down overnight and you would roll off it and break something 😁!
customer_reviews.author: Smokedmackerel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very comfortable and easy to use. If you have guests who decide at the last minute to stay overnight you can have the bed inflated and ready to use within 10 minutes. It stores away quite compactly when deflated. Overall a great occational bed at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is fantastic. It inflates very easily and is great it also deflates with the inbuilt pump. This means it can be packed away easily into the handy storage bag supplied. It worked really well for myself and my partner as we are different body weights she has previously complained she feels like she is being rolled around to my side. No such issues with this bad boy. And it’s big enough for our two little one’s to join us for a cuddle in the morning. What more could you want from an air mattress? Great job Sable 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be Easier !
customer_reviews.text: We certainly made the right choice with the purchase of this product. Having done our research into which blow up bed to go for, we went for the Sable queen size one. Inflates in a few minutes, incredibly well made and super comfy ! Deflates in the same time just minutes and folds away into the handy carrying bag ! If your looking for a quality bed that is easy to inflate look no further...we are well chuffed with this beauty !
customer_reviews.author: Dean R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic air bed
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic air bed. We use as a couple, really comfortable and stays up all night. Used for about 3 weeks in total now and no issues. Actually a really large bed too- it is a UK King size! Super easy to inflate and rolls up /packs away into a bag that’s actually big enough! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Home comfort
customer_reviews.text: After many attempts I finally found an air bed simulating my home comforts! Comfortable and maintains its size and shape, doesn’t deflate by the morning. You will not regret purchase and sleep in peace.
customer_reviews.author: Bay leaf 55

customer_reviews.title: A guaranteed good nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: After having a few air beds and being very disappointed with them as they were uncomfortable and lost air whilst I slept on them I decided to do my research for a quality bed for camping, and came across Sable. I read many reviews on many sites and came to the decision this bed was for me. After my first nights sleep I was so pleased with how firm it was, and very warm, just like a real mattress. I didn't need to top up any air for 3 days and then it was such a small amount. I love this bed and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MR B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great size.
customer_reviews.text: This Air bed has exceeded expectations in so many ways. It’s huge, super comfortable and inflates really quickly! I’ve been searching for an air bed for a long time and really glad I opted for this one.
customer_reviews.author: L1lWedge

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after only a few weeks of use but excellent Sable customer service
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave this 2 stars but increased to 3 after excellent service from Andrea at Sable. Fairly easy to inflate and deflate but quite noisy. Bed has only been used a couple of weeks and already has a leak so we are unable to use it. I have checked everywhere and cannot find the leak in the material or valve but its there somewhere. How much time do you waste looking for this when it shouldn't happen in the first place? Bed was fairly comfortable but we bought a memory foam folding mattress from Amazon to replace it which is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a camping trip withy kids, I don't usually like camping so thought I would spend a bit extra to be comfortable.. and was it worth it! This is more comfortable than my own bed! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver giles.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: The best blow up mattress I’ve even bought and I’ve bought a few. It I huge, more king size than double size. Stays inflated all night, in fact pretty much all week. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: sbandta

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: I not used until now or I decided to use all this night first very confortable easy to use but at the morning the mattress was deflated not a lot but enough for feeling it I didn't see any hole but a bit disappointed I hope the mattress is not going to be unusable in a future
customer_reviews.author: jennifer noumen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality air bed!
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this air bed a week ago as I had some friends staying over for a few days. Delivery was fast and the item was well packaged. The inflation instructions were easy to follow. I allowed the mattress to sit inflated for about 10 hours before use, as instructed. My friends used it for 4 nights and only needed to top up the air once! The quality is good and comes with a useful drawstring bag which allows it to be stored easily. Very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant mattress
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate with built in air pump. Very comfortable. Have tried few inflatable mattresses, this one most comfortable by far. Seems that internal compartments are preventing this mattress to bounce when used by two. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Miro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is actually more comfortable than our bed! We bought the inflatable mattress when we had visitors staying over. We gave them our room and slept downstairs. It was actually the best night's sleep I've had in ages! I also love how it's so easy to inflate and deflate. Our previous inflatable mattress came with a bulky external plug which was awkward to use and to store. This mattress has a built in pump that both inflates and deflates so that it's easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Suleman Chohan

customer_reviews.title: Must buy. Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: This is super. I don't know what words to describe this product, but you should buy this. It is easy to inflate deflate and very comfy to sleep on it. I believe it is made of a good quality material. Even there's a bag to keep it after use. But, it's quite heavy for me as a woman to carry but that's alright since the quality talks more!
customer_reviews.author: Ayu Mawar Rini

customer_reviews.title: Great high end air bed
customer_reviews.text: Neither me or my girlfriend have a double bed, so when staying round each others houses, this bed makes things so much more comfortable. It's very easy to put up and down, very fast to inflate (only taking a few minutes) and easy to store. It is a great buy if you are going to be using it as a fair amount. The inbuilt pillow isn't the best, but it can double up as a base of other pillows which isn't a bad thing. There if you want it, harmless if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lindley

customer_reviews.title: Spacious air bed. Easy to inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.text: Large air bed with built in pillow. Very firm when inflated but does lose air overnight. Easy and quick to both inflate and deflate. Reasonably comfortable and good depth off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Criddle

customer_reviews.title: The best air bed money can buy - 2 years on
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended this product to so many people! Never thought I'd recommend an airbed but this is by far the best airbed I have ever experienced. This has also been confirmed by every person that has stayed at mine and had the pleasure of sleeping on it. One of my friends even contemplated getting rid of his bed in place of this.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Murrell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate, and oh so comfy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a guest bed, something we could put up and down accordingly, perfect! It's so cosy and comfy however, that we might end up sleeping on it instead!!
customer_reviews.author: Esme Driver

customer_reviews.title: Very good air bed and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this in October 2019 has been fine till the last month or so when it started to deflate throu the night while useing it as a normal bed for the money I wish it would have lasted longer as I can’t find any holes in it anywhere so might be the fitting on it what can I do about this
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Best replacement to ordinary bed!
customer_reviews.text: I had to live without a bed for a month. I though this sable bed will be a few day rescue measure which I can use in the future when having guests etc. But 2 days turned into few weeks! Now that I have my actual bed I miss the inflatable bed! We put foam mattress topper and honestly you couldn’t tell it was inflatable bed! I am so impressed with this product! I don’t often write reviews but this one deserved a mention! Worth every penny! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: A perfect upgrade, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best air bed I’ve ever purchased or slept on. It inflated quickly and easily, and after resting it for the recommended 8 hours, we had the most Comfortable sleep (opting to sleep on the air bed rather than our own bed!) It’s incredibly sturdy, and my partner can get up in the night without it waking or moving me. It’s also enormous (closer to UK king). We have some lucky guests in future!!
customer_reviews.author: Charys

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting it to be this comfortable. Pumped it to the firmness of your liking put bedding on top and you have a real bed there. It is easy to inflate and deflate as well. The build quality is great. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing quality. It’s very easy to inflate and deflate, no effort at all, just takes a few minutes. The mattress is very firm and extremely comfortable. Will be used for camping as well as a spare bed in the house. It’s plenty big enough for two
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Gain

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very quick built in pump, which inflates and deflates. Plenty of room for 2 people and relatively comfy. Take note, the built in pump is on a 240v 3 pin plug so if you're planning on 'glamping' you cant plug it into your cigarette lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Hemantan

customer_reviews.title: Elec Air Bed
customer_reviews.text: Auto pump feature is great, the soft felt surface has a nice feel. The only minor gripe is that it seems slightly larger than a double bed. Otherwise it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic blow up bed. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had double blow up beds in the past, and always hated either both waking up in the middle of a deflated bed, or waking up whenever the other person makes any slight movement...but this bed was fantastic! Slept on it for 3 nights camping and was comfortable throughout. It’s also not quite as high as the other high quality beds, which is also good for camping. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: good product + customer service
customer_reviews.text: Used my mattress on and off for about a half year, and was super happy with it. Recently it seemed to malfunction a bit -- it wouldn't retain shape after about 10 minutes. I couldn't diagnose the problem and Sable offered to send me a new mattress. The customer service was quick and easy. Overall, a great product (when it works obviously), and a company that was willing to help me out when I had issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great airbed! So much better than any we've had before!
customer_reviews.text: SO EASY! Quick to inflate, super firm when inflated (so much more pressure than we could get in previous airbeds that we have had (like our previous Ready-bed) and the best bit is that you can get ALL of the air out of it for easy packdown. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariojoshi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is easy to inflate and deflate, a good size, strong and comfortable and easily goes back into its bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but deflated during first night of use. Said 12 month Warranty on the box but as we bought in October but not used until January we are outside the Amazon return window so warranty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 months - useless afterwards
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first, but then multiple holes by 3rd month of use. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Elgh0913

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable air bed, quick to inflate with the inbuilt inflator and great big bed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chinye

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described - What a fantastic bed!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable Airbed... Just like our king size bed at home, and only takes minutes to inflate and your ready to go! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Sputnik

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress. My old double air mattress sprung a leak after about 5 years of use. I decided it was time to get a better think one for when friends visit. This one looked to fit the bill. I haven’t been disappointed at all, it’s huge, very comfortable and the built in pump makes it super easy to inflate. I would definitely recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Massive comfort
customer_reviews.text: This thing is by far the best air bed I have ever tried. Although I maybe should have bought the smaller 1 as it fills the bedroom area in the tent which is a 4 man! Stays inflated, I can get off the bed without my wife dropping to the floor. And can get on in it with the wife getting thrown off. Very comfy for multiple nights.
customer_reviews.author: Lee D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Sable was simply superb
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the best mattress for our week long camping trip. No back ache, no deflation and no condensation. Easy to pack back into bag and I for one would rather sleep on this blow up bed than my proper bed in the house!
customer_reviews.author: ScubiLu

customer_reviews.title: Ignore 5 Star Reviews
customer_reviews.text: The produt itself is prefectly fine. Followed instructions and left inflated to let it bed in and found it stayed inflated over night, BONUS. Two nights tested and we are OK. Now, the issue I have is that they look to bribe customers with a £15 Amazon Gift Card if a 5 star review is posted. Shocking and Amazon should not allow this practise.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosM

customer_reviews.title: Deflates!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly didn’t live up to its promise. On it’s second night it started deflating, resulting in a very poor nights sleep. We have another double mattress from Decathalon, that costs £25. That one is much better! Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is super big, comfortable enough for a temp bed and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it as a guest temp bed. It has arrived in a timely manner. Since arrival I'm using it which is about 2.5 weeks now to ensure it's durable enough before I even use it for guests. So far it works very well. I re-inflate every 5-6 days just to maintain the desired hardness. I like this bed a lot.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really glad we made this purchase, which was primarily for use in our 5m bell tent. We’ve used it every night for 2 weeks and it’s been brilliant. So easy to use. Slightly longer than other beds on the market so is perfect for me as I’m tall and usually end up with my feet hanging off the end, but not with this one! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H-A

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable and light bed. Inflates in 1 minute and does not lose a lot of air during the night. Tough and durable, a wonderful 7-night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Big for a double, but good quality product for two adults.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a spare bed for the weekend, did the job nicely, big for a double sizing, but had just enough space for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne F.

customer_reviews.title: Better than my mattress, value for money is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I found this mattress an excelent purchase for the visit of my parents. Extremely easy to inflate, but the part is that it is more comfortable than my mattress. It is very sturdy, big enough for two people. The value provided by this product surpassed my expectations. I highly recommend buying this inflatable mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic product, very easy to inflate and it's firm, very easy to deflate and handy to put in a cabinet. Good thing is you can save quite a lot of space even a room when not in use. My child loves it and now is sleeping on it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Gaius Boltar

customer_reviews.title: leak issues
customer_reviews.text: just under a month of using and it it gain a leak. done everything we can to try but we cant find the leak to patch it
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Had 2 and problems with both
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the 3 above points but I have had 2 and the first went down after 2 uses and the 2nd (current) one seems to have deformed and gone out of shape. Maybe I've been unlucky, otherwise good bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Used this bed for the first time last weekend. Our guests loved it and said it was spacious and comfortable. It's a nice sleek design too and doesn't sit high off the floor. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought double size bed and I am very pleased with it. My mother in law was visiting us and Me and my partner was sleeping on it and it was very comfortable. Best thing is that bed has higher section under head.
customer_reviews.author: Evija

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable air bed which can be easily stored away in the drawstring bag when not being used
customer_reviews.text: We bought this air bed as an extra bed for when our families visit. It’s so easy to inflate and deflate. It can easily be packed away in the drawstring bag when it’s not being used which is great for storage. Our nephew slept on the air bed at the weekend and he said it was really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use, compact and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use, compact and super comfortable. Great replacement and spacesaver for a bed in our spare room for the occasional guest.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Simple solution for giving guests somewhere to sleep without a lot of fuss
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bed for guests and this has been perfect. Was originally looking at one which cost £200 but after reading the reviews on this one thought I’d give it a try. I have not been disappointed. Great size, comfy enough and so easy to use. Overall very happy and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gray1

customer_reviews.title: Item deflates after few hours
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 times of use the item did deflate within few hours making it impossible to sleep on. Really bad experience considering we had friends over and we bought this item just for the occasion. I'd suggest you to consider different options when buying an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refund plz
customer_reviews.text: Hi I bough this bed in December and I is not good at all any time I sleep there I have back problems and its deflate very easy and is cold Plz can I have refund a full refund Thank you I barrie
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahima Barrie

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great inflatable mattress which is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of looking into which inflatable mattress I should buy I finally decided to buy this one, I am glad I did! It is very comfy, durable and surprisingly easy to inflate and store. Would purchase another and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Swamp duck

product_meta.title: Double Size Air Bed with Built-in Electric Pump and Pillow Inflatable Air Mattress Comfortable Flocked Top 228 x 152 x 43 cm
product_meta.description: Sable Double Size Air Bed with Built-in Electric Pump and Pillow Inflatable Air Mattress Comfortable Flocked Top 228 x 152 x 43 cm
